===JQuery UI Droppable as Wicket behavior example===

*[http://jqueryui.com/demos/droppable/ Original javascript version can be found here]*

*Prerequisites:* Your wicket application is configured to use JQWicket as described in the [http://code.google.com/p/jqwicket "Quick Start"] guide. Additionaly to the jquery core library you have to add "jquery ui" to the JQWicket's config.

*Description:* This example demonstrates how to integrate JQuery UI Droppable with the wicket components using JQWicket.

Simple droppable panel:
{{{
MyPanel p = new MyPanel(....);
p.add(JQBehaviors.droppable());
add(p);
}}}

or alternatively by explicitly instantiating `DroppableBehavior`:
{{{
MyPanel p = new MyPanel(....);
p.add(new DroppableBehavior());
add(p);
}}}


More complex Drag'n'Drop example [DragDropExample_HighLevel can be found here].
